features: VIBRANT Smart Fineliner Pens Set 18 Black ink, 0.38 mm Fine Point Black Pens, Black Fine Tip Marker Pens, Minimal Bleed Thru Ink. Perfect as Journal Pens, Planner Pens, Journaling Pens, Teacher Pens, Drawing & Art Supplies, Planner Accessories. Premium gift set for the family, friends, co-workers, Birthday, Christmas.

SMOOTH WRITING Fine tip marker pen set with superfine, metal-clad fine tipped and outstanding performance in all areas of writing, drawing, coloring, easy and comfortable to write. You will also find them great for home, work, business, colleague, church, club, and organazition activities.

GREAT marker pens for drawing lines & details, journal, planner, calendar, agenda, notebook, note taking, painting, writing, coloring, sketch, marker, signing, manga, animation, graphic, design, illustration, included artists fine-ink drawings and coloring small intricate patterns. Perfect Colored Pens for Middle School, High School, College, Bachelor, Graduate, Women, Men, Adult Coloring.

18 Black art writing drawing fine point pens. Water-based ink, minimal bleed thru (except very thin paper), these fine-tipped pens create fine lines and intense water-based colors. Packaged in a soft transparent vinyl bag.

WELL PACKAGE --- Our fine line pens come in a nice plastic storage case with fold over snap closure which can be easily placed in backpacks. For using in travel or used in the home . planner or journaling supplies for Christmas, Birthday, Mother's Day, Easter Day, Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Party, New Year's.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and Great Qualiy!
reviews.reviewText: I initially hesitated to purchase the iBayam Fine Tip Markers due to their incredibly affordable price. However, these markers have become my everyday essentials for school note-taking, coloring, and drawing. Don't let the low price fool you; these markers are an absolute gem!Unbeatable Value:The affordability of these markers is unmatched, making them a fantastic choice for anyone on a budget. Despite their low price, they deliver exceptional quality and performance. I was pleasantly surprised by their longevity and vibrant colors, which have remained consistent even with regular use.Perfect for School and Creative Projects:I use these markers daily for school note-taking, which have proven reliable and precise. The fine tip allows for neat and detailed writing, enhancing the overall organization of my notes. Additionally, they excel in coloring and various creative projects, providing a smooth and even application of color.Quality That Stands Tall:Be aware of more expensive brands; the iBayam Fine Tip Markers stand up to the competition effortlessly. Their ink flow is consistent, always ensuring clean lines and vivid colors. I have used them extensively, and they have yet to disappoint me.Versatile and Dependable:These markers have quickly become my go-to choice for various tasks. Whether outlining diagrams, highlighting important points, or adding vibrant hues to my artwork, these markers deliver outstanding results. Their versatility and dependability make them an indispensable tool in my creative and academic endeavors.Conclusion:In conclusion, the iBayam Fine Tip Markers are a budget-friendly marvel that offers unbeatable value and quality. Their impressive performance in school note-taking, coloring, and other creative tasks has made them a staple in my daily routine. Don't let their affordable price tag deceive you; these markers rival, if not surpass, more expensive options in the market. Five stars without a doubt – they have proven their worth and earned a permanent place in my collection of art supplies and school essentials!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fine point colorful pens!
reviews.reviewText: Love that this set comes with 18 different colors! The fine point is exactly what I wanted and they write flawlessly. They are easy to hold and will be perfect for my planner and not taking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the vivid colors, they are perfect for using with my calendar, and journals. Worth the price for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight & Clean lined.
reviews.reviewText: I gave these a 4 star only because one pen was broken upon receiving. However, I like these so much I am willing to do without one color so I can continue using the rest. These are lightweight and have a nice fine tip. The colors are nice and a perfect variety for journaling. They also do not bleed which is also a plus. I am enjoying these and will probably purchase more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these pens. I bought a set to use for my planner and have absolutely loved them. I love the colors. I love the fine point but more than that, I love how they glide!I have some other fine points I was using in a workbook and noticed how it felt as if I was somewhat scratching the paper. I used one of these in the same book and it was like night and day.Once these dry out, I will definitely buy another pack to replace them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my favorite pens ever
reviews.reviewText: i’ve bought these pens several times throughout the years and i always end up coming back to them! i love the way they write and that there are so many colors to chose from. they do bleed through the paper a little bit, but i don’t mind that too much. these pens are super affordable and i love using them in my planner for color coding!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great fine tipped colored pens. They are great for Journaling and updating your calendar. The ink perfectly matches the color of the lid. They feel comfortable in your hand while writing. Would recommend and buy again when a refill is needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful lines, good color, doesn't bleed
reviews.reviewText: LOVE these pens! They are thin with good colors, and they don't bleed through the page (unless you press pretty hard). I use them almost daily, and I've gifted them to someone else because I love them so much. Haven't met their match yet in terms of color and ease of writing. Absolutely worth the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fine tipped felt pens in amazing colours!
reviews.reviewText: I can't answer the longevity question yet as I only got these pens recently. I can tell you, though, that they're lovely, and the colours are bright and beautiful! I bought these to do fine work on various art projects and potentially to use with spirograph, which has little holes for the pen tips to fit. These babies do the trick!
They have Fine tip but colors are too light
I pennarelli sono di buona qualità purtroppo alcuni tappi non corrispondono al colore quindi bisogna prima provarli per capire il reale colore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Decent but a number of pens didn't work.
reviews.reviewText: A number of the pens didn't work. Ones that did were nice!
